attributes.action: Remove all Covid restrictions with the exception of the wearing of masks
attributes.additional_details:
The country's GDP has taken a 20.4% hit during Q2 of 2020 due to the lockdown measures introduced, which also required the government to increase our debt to more than 100% of GDP for the first time since 1961, to pay for furloughs.

Now that hospitals are better equipped to cope due to increased bed space, more ventilators and drug treatments, and that we now have a better understanding of the virus, further lockdowns and restrictions are not practicable.  It's time to go back to normality.
attributes.background: We want the Government to remove all Covid restrictions with the exception of the wearing of masks
